item.title: CVE-2024-27949|2024-03-01T07:30:26.981Z -- sirv.com -- Image Optimizer, Resizer and CDN – Sirv
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in sirv.Com Image Optimizer, Resizer and CDN – Sirv.This issue affects Image Optimizer, Resizer and CDN – Sirv: from n/a through 7.2.0.
